info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:30PM MDT until July 03 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTY... At 429 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Black Hawk, or 5 miles west of Rapid City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Black Hawk, Hisega, Rockerville, Bear Country and Reptile Gardens. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 53 and 60. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
